title: 为什么Mythicmobs刷的怪物不掉落经验
author: U酱.@
txt_content: 如题.为什么Mythicmobs的怪物不掉落经验!

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
在插件文件夹的Mythicmobs文件夹里的config设置--
http://xikage.elseland.net/mythicmobs/doku.php/configuration

replies.author: jiongjionger
replies.txt_content:
DropTable1:
  Drops:
  - C_RustySword 1-2 0.035
  - C_RustyAxe 1 0.15
  - 373:8261 3-5 0.5
  - 299 1 1
  - exp 10 1
  - heroesexp 10 1
  - phatloot PhatHelm 1
  - money 10 1
  - skillapi-exp 10 1
那个exp就是经验
